thread.title: After Gang Rape Arrests, WaPo Reporter Tries to Build Sympathy for Illegal Aliens
thread.title_full: After Gang Rape Arrests, WaPo Reporter Tries to Build Sympathy for Illegal Aliens

author: Ian Mason
title: After Gang Rape Arrests, WaPo Reporter Tries to Build Sympathy for Illegal Aliens

organizations.name: wapo reporter tries to build sympathy for illegal aliens  a washington post

text: A Washington Post reporter is looking for a family of illegal aliens so she can "help readers place themselves in the shoes of someone who feels no longer welcome in the United States," according to an email obtained by Breitbart.
